description: This table contains the reasons for replacing the existing implant.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REPLACE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column displays the reason for replacing the existing implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


recall


malfunction


infection


other
